info.name: CAS Server
info.description:
This is an very basic and experimental implementation of the CAS server protocol for Nextcloud. It is not another user backend for Nextcloud, instead it allows you to authenticate 3rd-party or custom web applications against the Nextcloud user database.
If you are creating a custom application and you want to integrate it seemlessly with Nextcloud login, you can either follow the [CAS protocol specification](https://apereo.github.io/cas/4.2.x/protocol/CAS-Protocol-Specification.html) or better use one of the many available CAS client libraries.
info.author: Marco Ziech
